file_insights.changes_summary: Added chrono-node validation to prevent AI date hallucination

patterns_discovered: Flexible date matching with position and text similarity
gotchas_discovered: Chrono-node might miss relative or unusual date formats
Complexity in matching extracted dates with source text
recommendations: Consider adding more fallback mechanisms for date extraction
Implement logging for unvalidated or partially validated dates
Create unit tests to cover various date extraction scenarios
